info.name: Dino Backend API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Dino Multi-Venue Platform with authentication and dummy data

body.raw:
{
  "workspace_display_name": "dino-demo-ws",
  "workspace_description": "Demo workspace for Dino platform testing",
  "business_type": "restaurant",
  "venue_name": "dino-demo",
  "venue_description": "A cozy demo venue for testing the Dino platform with great food and ambiance",
  "venue_location": {
    "address": "123 Demo Street, Tech Park",
    "city": "Bangalore",
    "state": "Karnataka",
    "country": "India",
    "postal_code": "560001",
    "latitude": 12.9716,
    "longitude": 77.5946,
    "landmark": "Near Tech Park Metro Station"
  },
  "venue_phone": "+919876543210",
  "venue_email": "contact@dino-demo.com",
  "venue_website": "https://dino-demo.com",
  "cuisine_types": ["Italian", "Continental", "Indian", "Beverages"],
  "price_range": "mid_range",
  "owner_email": "mohd.aiman@dinoplatform.com",
  "owner_phone": "+919876543210",
  "owner_first_name": "Mohd Aiman",
  "owner_last_name": "Saleem",
  "owner_password": "DinoDemo123!",
  "confirm_password": "DinoDemo123!"
}
